title: Calculator
description: A simple calculator app to perform basic arithmetic operations.

title: WeatherApp
description: An app to display the current weather and forecast for a given location using an API.

title: TicTacToe
description: A classic Tic-Tac-Toe game where two players compete.

title: TaskManager
description: A to-do app to create, update, and delete tasks, with local storage.

title: NotesApp
description: A notes-taking app where users can add, edit, and delete notes.

title: QRScanner
description: A QR code scanning app to scan and decode QR codes using the device camera.
